== HPPAPortStatus ==

This page summarizes the state and goals of the HPPA Ubuntu port. Though '''not supported''', breezy/hppa through jaunty/hppa can be found on the appropriate ports archives.

== Target platforms ==

All 32- and 64-bit PA1.1 and later hppa platforms are targeted.  PA1.0 machines are specifically not targeted (and known to not work.)

== State of the port ==
Current outstanding issues are:
** Port dropped in karmic due to lack of activity.

=== Packages status ===
No known issues.

=== Outstanding issues ===
No known issues.

=== Kernel status ===
No known issues.
 
=== Installer status ===
palo-installer sometimes needs a good whack upside the head to find the boot
device, esp if the boot partition is on swRAID1.
